name: Red Hag
senses: blood sense 90 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 16

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The hag can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The hag is an 8th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (Spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). She requires no material components to cast her spells. The hag has the following druid spells prepared: Cantrips (at will): animal friendship (red hags treat this as a cantrip), poison spray, thorn whip 1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, entangle, speak with animals 2nd level (3 slots): barkskin, flame blade, lesser restoration 3rd level (3 slots): call lightning, conjure animals, dispel magic, meld into stone 4th level (2 slots): control water, dominate beast, freedom of movement, hallucinatory terrain

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Blood Sense
traits.desc: A red hag automatically senses the presence of the blood of living creatures within 90 feet and can pinpoint their locations within 30 feet.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Siphoning Aura (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The red hag radiates an aura in a 30-foot radius, lasting for 3 rounds, that draws all fluids out through a creature's mouth, nose, eyes, ears, and pores. Every creature of the hag's choosing that starts its turn in the affected area takes 18 (4d6 + 4) necrotic damage, or half damage with a successful DC 15 Constitution saving throw.
